title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: Any XDC holders here?I was just about to start DCA but it has pumped 30% in the past 24 hours.I was doing a bit of research yesterday and many are saying XDC should do very well if XRP win the law suit which I believe they will so I want to bag a few thousand while prices are low but will now wait for it to retrace a bit.
